//| output: false
// ----------------------------
// Q2 — Dynamic Insights (prototype parity)
// ----------------------------
hz_q2InsightView = {
  const ok = !!hz_q2Meta?.ok
  if (!ok) {
    const err = hz_q2Meta?.error ?? "Missing required inputs."
    return html`<div class="hz-muted">Insights unavailable: ${err}</div>`
  }

  const denomMap = hz_q2DenomMap ?? new Map()
  const rowsL = Array.isArray(hz_q2DataL) ? hz_q2DataL : []
  const rowsR = Array.isArray(hz_q2DataR) ? hz_q2DataR : []

  const safe = (x) => {
    const v = Number(x)
    return Number.isFinite(v) ? v : 0
  }

  const prettyHaz = (h) => {
    const raw = String(h ?? "").trim()
    if (!raw) return "—"
    const h0 = raw.replace(/\s*\(.*?\)\s*/g, "").trim()
    if (!h0) return "—"
    const low = h0.toLowerCase()
    if (low === "no hazard") return "No hazard"
    if (low === "any") return "Any hazard"

    const cap = (s) => {
      const t = String(s ?? "").trim().toLowerCase()
      if (!t) return ""
      if (t === "dry") return "Dry"
      if (t === "heat") return "Heat"
      if (t === "wet") return "Wet"
      return t.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + t.slice(1)
    }

    return h0.split("+").map(cap).join("+")
  }

  const anyMap = (rows) => {
    const m = new Map()
    for (const r of (rows ?? [])) {
      if (String(r?.hazard ?? "") !== "any") continue
      const crop = r?.crop
      if (!crop) continue
      m.set(crop, safe(r?.total ?? 0))
    }
    return m
  }

  const pickTopHaz = (rows, crop, pred) => {
    let bestH = null
    let bestV = -Infinity
    for (const r of (rows ?? [])) {
      if (r?.crop !== crop) continue
      const h = String(r?.hazard ?? "")
      if (!pred(h)) continue
      const v = safe(r?.total ?? 0)
      if (v > bestV) {
        bestV = v
        bestH = h
      }
    }
    return { hazard: bestH, value: (bestV === -Infinity ? 0 : bestV) }
  }

  const calcScenarioTable = (rows, label) => {
    const any = anyMap(rows)
    const crops = Array.from(new Set([...any.keys(), ...Array.from(denomMap.keys())]))

    const data = crops.map((crop) => {
      const denom = safe(denomMap.get(crop) || 0)
      const unit = safe(any.get(crop) || 0)
      const pct = denom > 0 ? (100 * unit / denom) : null

      const topAlone = pickTopHaz(rows, crop, (h) => {
        if (!h) return false
        if (h === "any" || h === "no hazard") return false
        return !h.includes("+")
      })

      const topComp = pickTopHaz(rows, crop, (h) => {
        if (!h) return false
        if (h === "any" || h === "no hazard") return false
        return h.includes("+")
      })

      const pctAlone = denom > 0 ? (100 * safe(topAlone.value) / denom) : null
      const pctComp = denom > 0 ? (100 * safe(topComp.value) / denom) : null

      const pctStr = (x) => (x == null ? "—" : `${hz_formatNumber(x, { digits: 1, compact: false })}%`)
      const topAloneStr = topAlone.hazard ? `${prettyHaz(topAlone.hazard)} ${pctStr(pctAlone)}` : "—"
      const topCompStr = topComp.hazard ? `${prettyHaz(topComp.hazard)} ${pctStr(pctComp)}` : "—"

      return { crop, unit, pct: (pct ?? 0), topAloneStr, topCompStr }
    })

    data.sort((a, b) => (b.unit - a.unit))
    const top = data.slice(0, 5)

    const table = top.map((d) => ({
      "Commodity": d.crop,
      "Unit": d.unit,
      "%": d.pct,
      "Top Alone": d.topAloneStr,
      "Top Compound": d.topCompStr
    }))

    return { label, table }
  }

  const s1 = hz_s1?.label ?? "Left"
  const s2 = hz_s2?.label ?? "Right"
  const sev = hz_severityLabel ?? "selected"
  const nSel = (hz_selectedCommoditiesForReq ?? []).length
  const selTxt = nSel ? `${nSel}` : "your"

  const left = calcScenarioTable(rowsL, s1)
  const right = calcScenarioTable(rowsR, s2)

  const calcDiffTable = () => {
    const anyL = anyMap(rowsL)
    const anyR = anyMap(rowsR)
    const crops = Array.from(new Set([...anyL.keys(), ...anyR.keys(), ...Array.from(denomMap.keys())]))

    const byKey = (crop, h) => `${crop}||${h}`
    const mapL = new Map((rowsL ?? []).map((r) => [byKey(r?.crop ?? "", String(r?.hazard ?? "")), safe(r?.total ?? 0)]))
    const mapR = new Map((rowsR ?? []).map((r) => [byKey(r?.crop ?? "", String(r?.hazard ?? "")), safe(r?.total ?? 0)]))

    const diffRows = crops.map((crop) => {
      const denom = safe(denomMap.get(crop) || 0)
      const u1 = safe(anyL.get(crop) || 0)
      const u2 = safe(anyR.get(crop) || 0)
      const dU = u2 - u1
      const p1 = denom > 0 ? (100 * u1 / denom) : 0
      const p2 = denom > 0 ? (100 * u2 / denom) : 0
      const dP = p2 - p1

      const allHaz = new Set()
      for (const r of (rowsL ?? [])) if (r?.crop === crop) allHaz.add(String(r?.hazard ?? ""))
      for (const r of (rowsR ?? [])) if (r?.crop === crop) allHaz.add(String(r?.hazard ?? ""))

      const bestDelta = (pred) => {
        let bestH = null
        let bestAbs = -Infinity
        let bestDU = 0

        for (const h of allHaz) {
          if (!pred(h)) continue
          if (h === "any" || h === "no hazard") continue
          const v1 = safe(mapL.get(byKey(crop, h)) || 0)
          const v2 = safe(mapR.get(byKey(crop, h)) || 0)
          const du = v2 - v1
          const abs = Math.abs(du)
          if (abs > bestAbs) {
            bestAbs = abs
            bestH = h
            bestDU = du
          }
        }

        const dpp = denom > 0 ? (100 * bestDU / denom) : 0
        return { hazard: bestH, dpp }
      }

      const alone = bestDelta((h) => !String(h).includes("+"))
      const comp = bestDelta((h) => String(h).includes("+"))

      const fmtPP = (x) => {
        const v = Number(x)
        if (!Number.isFinite(v)) return "—"
        const sign = v > 0 ? "+" : ""
        return `${sign}${hz_formatNumber(v, { digits: 1, compact: false })} pp`
      }

      const topAlone = alone.hazard ? `${prettyHaz(alone.hazard)} ${fmtPP(alone.dpp)}` : "—"
      const topComp = comp.hazard ? `${prettyHaz(comp.hazard)} ${fmtPP(comp.dpp)}` : "—"

      return { crop, dU, dP, topAlone, topComp }
    })

    diffRows.sort((a, b) => (Math.abs(b.dU) - Math.abs(a.dU)))
    const top = diffRows.slice(0, 5)

    return top.map((d) => ({
      "Commodity": d.crop,
      "Δ Unit": d.dU,
      "Δ %": d.dP,
      "Top Δ Alone": d.topAlone,
      "Top Δ Compound": d.topComp
    }))
  }

  const diffTable = calcDiffTable()

  const fmtAbs = (v) => hz_formatNumber(v, { digits: 2, compact: false })
  const fmtPct = (v) => `${hz_formatNumber(v, { digits: 1, compact: false })}%`
  const fmtAbsSigned = (v) => {
    const x = Number(v)
    if (!Number.isFinite(x)) return "—"
    const sign = x > 0 ? "+" : ""
    return `${sign}${hz_formatNumber(x, { digits: 2, compact: false })}`
  }
  const fmtPP = (v) => {
    const x = Number(v)
    if (!Number.isFinite(x)) return "—"
    const sign = x > 0 ? "+" : ""
    return `${sign}${hz_formatNumber(x, { digits: 1, compact: false })} pp`
  }

  return html`<div>
    ${md`**Dynamic Insights**

Of ${selTxt} selected commodities, the most exposed commodities (in absolute terms) to **${sev}** hazards are:`}

    <div class="hz-insightSubhead">${left.label}</div>
    ${hz_atlasTable(left.table, {
      columns: ["Commodity", "Unit", "%", "Top Alone", "Top Compound"],
      rows: 5,
      height: "260px",
      format: { "Unit": fmtAbs, "%": fmtPct }
    })}

    <div class="hz-insightSubhead" style="margin-top:0.6rem">${right.label}</div>
    ${hz_atlasTable(right.table, {
      columns: ["Commodity", "Unit", "%", "Top Alone", "Top Compound"],
      rows: 5,
      height: "260px",
      format: { "Unit": fmtAbs, "%": fmtPct }
    })}

    ${md`These crops show the greatest absolute changes in **${sev}** exposure between **${s1}** and **${s2}**.`}

    ${hz_atlasTable(diffTable, {
      columns: ["Commodity", "Δ Unit", "Δ %", "Top Δ Alone", "Top Δ Compound"],
      rows: 5,
      height: "260px",
      format: { "Δ Unit": fmtAbsSigned, "Δ %": fmtPP }
    })}
  </div>`
}

              }
            }

    </div>
  `

  return html`
    <div class="hz-legendRow">${legend}</div>
    <div class="hz-grid2 hz-grid2--equal">

      ${plotStack(R, "Right")}
    </div>
  `
}

// Clean rows + apply client-side filters (scenario/timeframe + hazard view)

  }
  return (hz_q5SeriesAll ?? []).map(d => ({

    timeframe: String(d?.timeframe ?? ""),
    year: n(d?.year),
    hazard: String(d?.hazard ?? ""),
    value: n(d?.value),
    value_sd: n(d?.value_sd),
    value_low: n(d?.value_low),
    value_high: n(d?.value_high),
  }))

hz_q5BaselinesByHazard = {
  const isHist = (s) => /hist|historic/i.test(String(s ?? ""))
  const m = new Map()
  for (const r of (hz_q5RowsClean ?? [])) {
    if (!isHist(r?.scenario)) continue
    if (!r?.hazard) continue
    if (r?.value == null) continue
    if (!m.has(r.hazard)) m.set(r.hazard, r.value)
  }
  return m
}

hz_q5Filtered = {
  const isHist = (s) => /hist|historic/i.test(String(s ?? ""))
  const scenSel = (hz_q5_scenarios && hz_q5_scenarios.length) ? hz_q5_scenarios : hz_q5ScenarioOptions
  const tfSel = (hz_q5_timeframes && hz_q5_timeframes.length) ? hz_q5_timeframes : hz_q5TimeframeOptions

  const scenSet = new Set(scenSel.map(String))
  const tfSet = new Set(tfSel.map(String))

  const mode = String(hz_q5_viewMode ?? "all")
  const hzOne = String(hz_q5_hazard ?? "any")

  const out = []
  for (const r of (hz_q5RowsClean ?? [])) {
    if (!r) continue
    if (!r.hazard) continue
    if (r.value == null || r.year == null) continue

    if (isHist(r.scenario)) {
      out.push(r) // keep for baselines only
      continue
    }

    if (!scenSet.has(String(r.scenario))) continue
    if (!tfSet.has(String(r.timeframe))) continue
    if (mode === "one" && String(r.hazard) !== hzOne) continue

    out.push(r)
  }

  out.sort((a, b) => (a.year - b.year) || String(a.scenario).localeCompare(String(b.scenario)) || String(a.hazard).localeCompare(String(b.hazard)))

}

  const base = hz_q5BaselinesByHazard
  const scaleRow = (r) => {
    const b = base?.get?.(r.hazard)
    if (b == null || b === 0) return null
    const sc = 100 / b
    const num = (x) => (x == null ? null : x * sc)
    return {
      ...r,
      value: num(r.value),
      value_sd: num(r.value_sd),
      value_low: num(r.value_low),
      value_high: num(r.value_high),
    }
  }

  const out = []
  for (const r of (hz_q5Filtered ?? [])) {
    if (/hist|historic/i.test(String(r?.scenario ?? ""))) continue

    if (rr && rr.value != null) out.push(rr)
  }

// Jitter x positions slightly by scenario (so error bars/points don't sit exactly on top of each other)
hz_q5PlotRowsJittered = {

  const scenOrder = (hz_q5_scenarios && hz_q5_scenarios.length) ? hz_q5_scenarios.map(String) : hz_q5ScenarioOptions.map(String)
  const uniqueScen = Array.from(new Set(scenOrder))
  const n = uniqueScen.length
  const span = 0.70
  const step = (n > 1) ? (span / (n - 1)) : 0
  const offset = new Map(uniqueScen.map((s, i) => [s, (n > 1 ? (-span / 2 + i * step) : 0)]))

  return rows.map(r => ({
    ...r,
    xj: (Number(r.year) + (offset.get(String(r.scenario)) ?? 0))
  }))
}

// Baseline lines (historic exposure) shown as dashed rules
hz_q5BaselineRules = {
  const mode = String(hz_q5_scale ?? "abs")
  const hazards = ["any", "dry (any)", "heat (any)", "wet (any)"]
  const out = []
  for (const h of hazards) {
    const b = hz_q5BaselinesByHazard?.get?.(h)
    if (mode === "idx") {
      if (b != null) out.push({ hazard: h, baseline: 100 })
    } else {
      if (b != null) out.push({ hazard: h, baseline: b })
    }

}

hz_q5Plot = {
  if (hz_q5Meta?.error) return html`<div class="warn"><b>Q5 query failed:</b><br>${hz_q5Meta.error}</div>`

  const rowsJ = hz_q5PlotRowsJittered ?? []
  if (!rowsJ.length) return html`<div class="hz-loading">Loading chart…</div>`

  const modeView = String(hz_q5_viewMode ?? "all")
  const showUnc = !!hz_q5_showUncertainty
  const showLines = !!hz_q5_showLines
  const scaleMode = String(hz_q5_scale ?? "abs")

  const years = Array.from(new Set(rowsJ.map(d => Math.round(Number(d.year)))))
    .filter(Number.isFinite)
    .sort((a, b) => a - b)

  // Domain based on the actually plotted x positions (xj), so the chart never collapses to one edge.
  const xVals = (rowsJ ?? []).map(d => Number(d.xj)).filter(Number.isFinite)
  const xMin = xVals.length ? Math.min(...xVals) : (years.length ? years[0] : null)
  const xMax = xVals.length ? Math.max(...xVals) : (years.length ? years[years.length - 1] : null)

  const padYears = (xMin != null && xMax != null && xMin === xMax) ? 5 : 2
  const xDomain = (xMin != null && xMax != null) ? [xMin - padYears, xMax + padYears] : undefined

  // Only show ticks that fall inside the domain (avoids stray “baseline” years pushing everything right)
  const tickYears = xDomain ? years.filter(y => y >= xDomain[0] && y <= xDomain[1]) : years
  const fmt = (v) => hz_formatNumber(v, { digits: 2, compact: true })
  const fmtScenario = (s) => String(s ?? "").toUpperCase()
  const yLabel = (scaleMode === "idx")

    : (hz_varLabelAbs ?? "Exposure")

  const baseRules = hz_q5BaselineRules ?? []
  const baseForOne = (h) => {
    const r = baseRules.find(d => String(d.hazard) === String(h))
    return r ? Number(r.baseline) : null
  }

  const titleFor = (d) => {
    const parts = [
      `${fmtScenario(d.scenario)}  ${String(d.timeframe ?? "")}`,
      `Hazard: ${String(d.hazard ?? "")}`,
      `${fmt(d.value)}`
    ]
    if (showUnc && d.value_low != null && d.value_high != null) {
      parts.push(`CI: ${fmt(d.value_low)}–${fmt(d.value_high)}`)
    }
    return parts.join("\n")
  }

  const rowsOne = (modeView === "one")
    ? rowsJ.filter(d => String(d.hazard) === String(hz_q5_hazard ?? "any"))
    : rowsJ

  const baselineOne = (modeView === "one")
    ? baseForOne(String(hz_q5_hazard ?? "any"))
    : null

  const commonFy = (modeView === "all") ? { fy: "hazard" } : {}

  const marks = [
    ...(modeView === "all"
      ? [Plot.ruleY(baseRules, { y: "baseline", ...commonFy, strokeDasharray: "4,4", opacity: 0.55 })]
      : (baselineOne != null ? [Plot.ruleY([baselineOne], { strokeDasharray: "4,4", opacity: 0.55 })] : [])
    ),

    ...(showUnc ? [Plot.ruleY(rowsOne.filter(d => d.value_low != null && d.value_high != null), {
      x: "xj",
      y1: "value_low",
      y2: "value_high",
      stroke: "scenario",
      opacity: 0.35,
      ...commonFy
    })] : []),

    ...(showLines ? [Plot.line(rowsOne, {
      x: "year",
      y: "value",
      stroke: "scenario",
      opacity: 0.8,
      ...commonFy
    })] : []),

    Plot.dot(rowsOne, {
      x: "xj",
      y: "value",
      stroke: "scenario",
      fill: "scenario",
      r: 3,
      tip: true,
      title: titleFor,
      ...commonFy
    })
  ]

  const plotOpts = {
    height: Number(hz_q5_chartHeight ?? 720),
    marginLeft: 84,
    marginRight: 18,
    marginTop: 10,
    marginBottom: 44,
    x: {
      label: "Year",
      grid: true,
      domain: xDomain,
      ticks: tickYears,
      tickFormat: (d) => String(Math.round(d)),
      nice: false
    },
    y: { label: yLabel, grid: true },
    color: { legend: true, label: "Scenario" },
    marks
  }
  if (modeView === "all") {
    plotOpts.fy = { label: null, domain: ["any", "dry (any)", "heat (any)", "wet (any)"] }
  }

  return Plot.plot(plotOpts)
}

// ------------------------------------------------------------
// Q5 — Summary table + dynamic insights (Patch 5)
// ------------------------------------------------------------

// Baseline for a hazard under the current scale
hz_q5BaselineFor = (haz) => {
  const h = String(haz ?? "")
  const mode = String(hz_q5_scale ?? "abs")
  if (mode === "idx") return 100
  const v = hz_q5BaselinesByHazard?.get?.(h)
  return (v == null) ? null : Number(v)
}

// Table (chart-ready rows → table-ready rows)
hz_q5TableView = {
  if (hz_q5Meta?.error) return html`<div class="warn"><b>Q5 query failed:</b><br>${hz_q5Meta.error}</div>`

  const rows = hz_q5PlotRows ?? []
  if (!rows.length) return html`<div class="hz-loading">Loading table…</div>`

  const fmtAbs = (x) => {
    const v = Number(x)
    return Number.isFinite(v) ? hz_formatNumber(v, { digits: 2, compact: true }) : "—"
  }
  const fmtAbsFull = (x) => {
    const v = Number(x)
    return Number.isFinite(v) ? hz_formatNumber(v, { digits: 2, compact: false }) : "—"
  }
  const fmtPct = (x) => {
    const v = Number(x)
    return Number.isFinite(v) ? `${hz_formatNumber(v, { digits: 2, compact: false })}%` : "—"
  }

  const hasUnc = !!hz_q5Meta?.has_value_sd

  const out = (rows ?? [])
    .filter(r => {
      const h = String(r?.hazard ?? "").trim()
      const s = String(r?.scenario ?? "").trim()
      const tf = String(r?.timeframe ?? "").trim()
      return (r && tf &&
              h && h.toLowerCase() !== "null" &&
              s && s.toLowerCase() !== "null")
    })
    .map((r) => {
      const b = hz_q5BaselineFor(r.hazard)
      const v = (r.value == null ? null : Number(r.value))
      const bb = (b == null ? null : Number(b))

      const delta = (bb == null || v == null || !Number.isFinite(bb) || !Number.isFinite(v))
        ? null
        : (v - bb)

      const pct = (bb == null || !Number.isFinite(bb) || bb === 0 || delta == null || !Number.isFinite(delta))
        ? null
        : (100 * delta / bb)

      const ciwRaw = (!hasUnc || r.value_low == null || r.value_high == null)
        ? null
        : (Number(r.value_high) - Number(r.value_low))

      const ciw = (ciwRaw == null || !Number.isFinite(ciwRaw) || ciwRaw <= 0) ? null : ciwRaw

      return ({
        "Hazard": String(r.hazard ?? ""),
        "Scenario": String(r.scenario ?? "").toUpperCase(),
        "Period": String(r.timeframe ?? ""),
        "Year": Number(r.year),
        "Value": v,
        "Baseline": (bb == null || !Number.isFinite(bb)) ? null : bb,
        "Δ vs baseline": (delta == null || !Number.isFinite(delta)) ? null : Number(delta),
        "Δ% vs baseline": (pct == null || !Number.isFinite(pct)) ? null : Number(pct),
        "CI width": ciw
      })
    })

  // Sort: hazard then year then scenario
  out.sort((a, b) =>
    String(a["Hazard"]).localeCompare(String(b["Hazard"])) ||
    (Number(a["Year"]) - Number(b["Year"])) ||
    String(a["Scenario"]).localeCompare(String(b["Scenario"]))
  )

  const scaleMode = String(hz_q5_scale ?? "abs")
  const valueLabel = (scaleMode === "idx") ? "Index" : "Value"

  // Rename columns dynamically (without mutating the table rows)
  const data = out.map((d) => ({
    ...d,
    [valueLabel]: d["Value"]
  }))

  return hz_atlasTable(data, {
    columns: ["Hazard", "Scenario", "Period", "Year", valueLabel, "Baseline", "Δ vs baseline", "Δ% vs baseline", "CI width"],
    format: {
      "Year": (x) => Number.isFinite(Number(x)) ? String(Math.round(Number(x))) : "—",
      [valueLabel]: fmtAbsFull,
      "Baseline": fmtAbsFull,
      "Δ vs baseline": fmtAbsFull,
      "Δ% vs baseline": fmtPct,
      "CI width": fmtAbs
    },
    rows: 14,
    height: "580px",
    width: {
      "Hazard": 150,
      "Scenario": 120,
      "Period": 150,
      "Year": 90,
      [valueLabel]: 150,
      "Baseline": 150,
      "Δ vs baseline": 150,
      "Δ% vs baseline": 140,
      "CI width": 120
    }
  })
}

hz_q5_wireViewToggle = {

  const update = () => {

}


// Insights helper: table renderer (stacked, no side-by-side)

          }

hz_q5Insight = {
  const err = hz_q5Meta?.error
  if (err) return html`<div class="hz-muted">Insights unavailable: ${err}</div>`

  const rows = hz_q5PlotRows ?? []
  if (!rows.length) return html`<div class="hz-muted">Insights will appear once results load.</div>`

  const fmt = (v) => hz_formatNumber(v, { digits: 2, compact: true })
  const fmtFull = (v) => hz_formatNumber(v, { digits: 2, compact: false })
  const fmtPct = (v) => `${hz_formatNumber(v, { digits: 2, compact: false })}%`

  const hazardsInView = (() => {
    const modeView = String(hz_q5_viewMode ?? "all")
    if (modeView === "one") return [String(hz_q5_hazard ?? "any")]
    // keep the canonical order
    const dom = ["any", "dry (any)", "heat (any)", "wet (any)"]
    const present = new Set(rows.map(r => String(r.hazard)))
    return dom.filter(h => present.has(h))
  })()

  // Latest row per hazard+scenario
  const latest = []
  for (const h of hazardsInView) {
    const byScen = new Map()
    for (const r of rows) {
      if (String(r.hazard) !== String(h)) continue
      const s = String(r.scenario ?? "").trim()
      if (!s || s.toLowerCase() === "null") continue
      const prev = byScen.get(s)
      if (!prev || Number(r.year) > Number(prev.year)) byScen.set(s, r)
    }
    for (const r of byScen.values()) latest.push(r)
  }

  const hasUnc = !!hz_q5Meta?.has_value_sd
  const abs = Math.abs

  const withDeltas = latest.map((r) => {
    const b = hz_q5BaselineFor(r.hazard)
    const v = (r.value == null ? null : Number(r.value))
    const bb = (b == null ? null : Number(b))

    const delta = (bb == null || v == null || !Number.isFinite(bb) || !Number.isFinite(v))
      ? null
      : (v - bb)

    const pct = (bb == null || !Number.isFinite(bb) || bb === 0 || delta == null || !Number.isFinite(delta))
      ? null
      : (100 * delta / bb)

    const ciwRaw = (!hasUnc || r.value_low == null || r.value_high == null)
      ? null
      : (Number(r.value_high) - Number(r.value_low))

    const ciw = (ciwRaw == null || !Number.isFinite(ciwRaw) || ciwRaw <= 0) ? null : ciwRaw

    return { ...r, baseline: bb, delta, pct, ciw }
  })

  // Largest increase (positive Δ) + smallest change (min |Δ|) per hazard
  const topInc = []
  const lowInc = []
  for (const h of hazardsInView) {
    const xs = withDeltas
      .filter(d => String(d.hazard) === String(h))
      .filter(d => Number.isFinite(d.delta))

    if (!xs.length) continue

    xs.sort((a, b) => (b.delta - a.delta))
    topInc.push(xs[0])

    const minAbs = xs.reduce((best, cur) => (abs(cur.delta) < abs(best.delta) ? cur : best), xs[0])
    lowInc.push(minAbs)
  }

  const colsMain = ["Hazard", "Scenario", "Period", "Year", "Value", "Δ", "Δ%"]
  const rowToObj = (r) => ({
    "Hazard": String(r.hazard ?? ""),
    "Scenario": String(r.scenario ?? "").toUpperCase(),
    "Period": String(r.timeframe ?? ""),
    "Year": Number.isFinite(Number(r.year)) ? String(Math.round(Number(r.year))) : "—",
    "Value": (r.value == null ? "—" : fmtFull(r.value)),
    "Δ": (r.delta == null ? "—" : fmtFull(r.delta)),
    "Δ%": (r.pct == null ? "—" : fmtPct(r.pct))
  })

  // Uncertainty hotspots (widest CI among ALL plotted rows)
  const unc = (!hasUnc)
    ? []
    : (rows ?? [])
        .filter(r => {
          const h = String(r?.hazard ?? "").trim()
          const s = String(r?.scenario ?? "").trim()
          return (r && r.value_low != null && r.value_high != null &&
                  h && h.toLowerCase() !== "null" &&
                  s && s.toLowerCase() !== "null")
        })
        .map(r => ({
          ...r,
          ciw: Number(r.value_high) - Number(r.value_low)
        }))
        .filter(r => Number.isFinite(r.ciw) && r.ciw > 0)
        .sort((a,b) => (b.ciw - a.ciw))
        .slice(0, 6)

  const colsUnc = ["Hazard", "Scenario", "Period", "Year", "CI width"]
  const uncRows = unc.map(r => ({
    "Hazard": String(r.hazard ?? ""),
    "Scenario": String(r.scenario ?? "").toUpperCase(),
    "Period": String(r.timeframe ?? ""),
    "Year": Number.isFinite(Number(r.year)) ? String(Math.round(Number(r.year))) : "—",
    "CI width": fmtFull(r.ciw)
  }))

  const scaleMode = String(hz_q5_scale ?? "abs")
  const lead = (scaleMode === "idx")
    ? _lang({
        en: "Insights below use the latest selected period per scenario, indexed to the historic baseline (100).",
        fr: "Les aperçus ci-dessous utilisent la dernière période sélectionnée par scénario, indexée à la référence historique (100).",
        pt: "Os insights abaixo usam o último período selecionado por cenário, indexado à linha de base histórica (100)."
      })
    : _lang({
        en: "Insights below use the latest selected period per scenario, compared to the historic baseline.",
        fr: "Les aperçus ci-dessous utilisent la dernière période sélectionnée par scénario, comparée à la référence historique.",
        pt: "Os insights abaixo usam o último período selecionado por cenário, comparado à linha de base histórica."
      })

  return html`
    <div class="hz-q4InsightBlock">
      <div class="hz-q4InsightLead">${md`${lead}`}</div>

      <div>
        <div class="hz-q4Subhead">${md`${_lang({
          en: "Largest increases vs baseline (latest period)",
          fr: "Plus fortes hausses vs référence (dernière période)",
          pt: "Maiores aumentos vs linha de base (último período)"
        })}`}</div>
        ${hz_q5_smallTable(colsMain, topInc.map(rowToObj))}
      </div>

      <div>
        <div class="hz-q4Subhead">${md`${_lang({
          en: "Smallest change vs baseline (latest period)",
          fr: "Plus faible variation vs référence (dernière période)",
          pt: "Menor variação vs linha de base (último período)"
        })}`}</div>
        ${hz_q5_smallTable(colsMain, lowInc.map(rowToObj))}
      </div>

      <div>
        <div class="hz-q4Subhead">${md`${_lang({
          en: "Uncertainty hotspots (widest confidence intervals)",
          fr: "Points chauds d’incertitude (IC les plus larges)",
          pt: "Pontos críticos de incerteza (IC mais amplos)"
        })}`}</div>
        ${hz_q5_smallTable(colsUnc, uncRows)}
        ${uncRows.length ? null : html`<div class="hz-muted">${md`${hasUnc
          ? _lang({
              en: "Uncertainty bars are unavailable for the current selection (confidence intervals are missing or zero-width).",
              fr: "Les barres d’incertitude ne sont pas disponibles pour la sélection actuelle (IC manquants ou de largeur nulle).",
              pt: "Barras de incerteza indisponíveis para a seleção atual (intervalos ausentes ou de largura zero)."
            })
          : _lang({
              en: "Uncertainty bars are unavailable for the current selection (no `value_sd` in the source).",
              fr: "Les barres d’incertitude ne sont pas disponibles pour la sélection actuelle (pas de `value_sd` dans la source).",
              pt: "Barras de incerteza indisponíveis para a seleção atual (sem `value_sd` na fonte)."
            })}`}</div>`}
      </div>
    </div>
  `
}



hz_q4Rows = {
  const nnum = (x) => {
    const v = Number(x)
    return Number.isFinite(v) ? v : 0
  }
  const mapL = new Map((hz_q4DataL ?? []).map(d => [String(d?.admin_name ?? d?.admin ?? "Unknown"), nnum(d?.total)]))
  const mapR = new Map((hz_q4DataR ?? []).map(d => [String(d?.admin_name ?? d?.admin ?? "Unknown"), nnum(d?.total)]))
  const names = Array.from(new Set([...mapL.keys(), ...mapR.keys()]))
  const rows = names.map(name => ({ name, total1: nnum(mapL.get(name)), total2: nnum(mapR.get(name)) }))
  rows.sort((a,b) => (b.total2 - a.total2) || (b.total1 - a.total1))
  return rows.slice(0, Math.max(1, Number(hz_topN ?? 10) || 10))
}

// Q4 helper rows: normalize hazard-by-admin payload (fallbacks to totals-only rows if API not patched yet)
hz_q4HazRowsL_norm = {
  const src = Array.isArray(hz_q4HazDataL) && hz_q4HazDataL.length ? hz_q4HazDataL : (hz_q4DataL ?? []).map((d) => ({ ...d, hazard: "any" }))
  return src
    .map((d) => ({
      admin: String(d?.admin_name ?? d?.admin ?? d?.name ?? "Unknown"),
      hazard: String(d?.hazard ?? "any"),
      total: Number(d?.total ?? d?.value ?? 0)
    }))
    .filter((d) => d.admin && Number.isFinite(d.total))
}

hz_q4HazRowsR_norm = {
  const src = Array.isArray(hz_q4HazDataR) && hz_q4HazDataR.length ? hz_q4HazDataR : (hz_q4DataR ?? []).map((d) => ({ ...d, hazard: "any" }))
  return src
    .map((d) => ({
      admin: String(d?.admin_name ?? d?.admin ?? d?.name ?? "Unknown"),
      hazard: String(d?.hazard ?? "any"),
      total: Number(d?.total ?? d?.value ?? 0)
    }))
    .filter((d) => d.admin && Number.isFinite(d.total))
}

hz_q4NonCompoundBuckets = (rows) => {
  const byAdmin = new Map()
  const add = (admin, hazard, v) => {
    const key = `${admin}||${hazard}`
    byAdmin.set(key, (byAdmin.get(key) || 0) + v)
  }

  for (const r of (rows ?? [])) {
    const h = String(r?.hazard ?? "")
    const admin = String(r?.admin ?? "")
    if (!admin) continue
    const v = Number(r?.total ?? 0)
    if (!Number.isFinite(v)) continue

    if (h === "any") add(admin, "any", v)

    if (h && h !== "any" && h !== "no hazard") {
      if (h.includes("dry")) add(admin, "dry (any)", v)
      if (h.includes("heat")) add(admin, "heat (any)", v)
      if (h.includes("wet")) add(admin, "wet (any)", v)
    }
  }

  const out = []
  for (const [key, total] of byAdmin.entries()) {
    const [admin, hazard] = key.split("||")
    out.push({ admin, hazard, total })
  }
  return out
}

hz_q4CompoundExclusive = (rows) => {
  const out = []
  for (const r of (rows ?? [])) {
    const h0 = String(r?.hazard ?? "")
    const admin = String(r?.admin ?? "")
    if (!admin) continue
    const v = Number(r?.total ?? 0)
    if (!Number.isFinite(v)) continue

    if (h0 === "dry") out.push({ hazard: "dry (only)", admin, total: v })
    else if (h0 === "heat") out.push({ hazard: "heat (only)", admin, total: v })
    else if (h0 === "wet") out.push({ hazard: "wet (only)", admin, total: v })
    else if (h0 === "dry+heat" || h0 === "dry+wet" || h0 === "heat+wet" || h0 === "dry+heat+wet") out.push({ hazard: h0, admin, total: v })
  }
  return out
}

hz_q4CompoundSimplified = (rows) => {
  const bucket = (h) => {
    const h0 = String(h).replace(" (only)", "")
    const n = h0.split("+").filter(Boolean).length
    if (n === 1) return "1 hazard"
    if (n === 2) return "2 hazards"
    if (n === 3) return "3 hazards"
    return null
  }

  const agg = new Map()
  for (const r of (rows ?? [])) {
    const admin = String(r?.admin ?? "")
    if (!admin) continue
    const b = bucket(String(r?.hazard ?? ""))
    if (!b) continue
    const key = `${admin}||${b}`
    const v = Number(r?.total ?? 0)
    if (!Number.isFinite(v)) continue
    agg.set(key, (agg.get(key) || 0) + v)
  }

  const out = []
  for (const [key, total] of agg.entries()) {
    const [admin, hazard] = key.split("||")
    out.push({ admin, hazard, total })
  }
  return out
}

hz_q4HazMerge = (rowsL, rowsR) => {
  const keyOf = (d) => `${d?.admin ?? ""}||${d?.hazard ?? ""}`
  const mapL = new Map((rowsL ?? []).map((d) => [keyOf(d), Number(d?.total ?? 0)]))
  const mapR = new Map((rowsR ?? []).map((d) => [keyOf(d), Number(d?.total ?? 0)]))
  const keys = Array.from(new Set([...mapL.keys(), ...mapR.keys()]))

  return keys.map((k) => {
    const [admin, hazard] = k.split("||")
    const total1 = Number(mapL.get(k) || 0)
    const total2 = Number(mapR.get(k) || 0)
    return { admin, hazard, total1, total2, diff: total2 - total1 }
  })
}

hz_q4Set_compound_full = hz_q4HazMerge(hz_q4CompoundExclusive(hz_q4HazRowsL_norm), hz_q4CompoundExclusive(hz_q4HazRowsR_norm))
hz_q4Set_compound_simple = hz_q4HazMerge(hz_q4CompoundSimplified(hz_q4CompoundExclusive(hz_q4HazRowsL_norm)), hz_q4CompoundSimplified(hz_q4CompoundExclusive(hz_q4HazRowsR_norm)))
hz_q4Set_noncompound = hz_q4HazMerge(hz_q4NonCompoundBuckets(hz_q4HazRowsL_norm), hz_q4NonCompoundBuckets(hz_q4HazRowsR_norm))

hz_q4HazSetActive = {
  if (!!hz_q4_showCompound) {
    return hz_q4_simplifyCompound ? (hz_q4Set_compound_simple ?? []) : (hz_q4Set_compound_full ?? [])
  }
  return hz_q4Set_noncompound ?? []
}

hz_q4HazLevels = (
  !!hz_q4_showCompound
    ? (!!hz_q4_simplifyCompound
        ? ["1 hazard", "2 hazards", "3 hazards"]
        : ["dry (only)", "heat (only)", "wet (only)", "dry+heat", "dry+wet", "heat+wet", "dry+heat+wet"])
    : ["dry (any)", "heat (any)", "wet (any)", "any"]
)

hz_q4RowsChart = {
  const set = Array.isArray(hz_q4HazSetActive) ? hz_q4HazSetActive : []
  const hazLevels = Array.isArray(hz_q4HazLevels) ? hz_q4HazLevels : []
  if (!set.length) return []

  const totalL_all = set.reduce((s, r) => s + Number(r?.total1 ?? 0), 0)
  const totalR_all = set.reduce((s, r) => s + Number(r?.total2 ?? 0), 0)
  const valL = (r) => hz_rel ? (totalL_all ? (100 * Number(r?.total1 ?? 0) / totalL_all) : 0) : Number(r?.total1 ?? 0)
  const valR = (r) => hz_rel ? (totalR_all ? (100 * Number(r?.total2 ?? 0) / totalR_all) : 0) : Number(r?.total2 ?? 0)

  const rankMap = new Map()
  if (hz_q4_difference) {
    const useAny = hazLevels.includes("any")
    if (useAny) {
      for (const r of set) {
        if (String(r?.hazard ?? "") !== "any") continue
        rankMap.set(String(r?.admin ?? ""), Math.abs(valR(r) - valL(r)))
      }
    } else {
      const tmp = new Map()
      for (const r of set) {
        const admin = String(r?.admin ?? "")
        tmp.set(admin, (tmp.get(admin) || 0) + (valR(r) - valL(r)))
      }
      for (const [admin, delta] of tmp.entries()) rankMap.set(admin, Math.abs(delta))
    }
  } else {
    const useAny = hazLevels.includes("any")
    if (useAny) {
      for (const r of set) {
        if (String(r?.hazard ?? "") !== "any") continue
        rankMap.set(String(r?.admin ?? ""), valR(r))
      }
    } else {
      for (const r of set) {
        const admin = String(r?.admin ?? "")
        rankMap.set(admin, (rankMap.get(admin) || 0) + valR(r))
      }
    }
  }

  const n = Math.max(1, Number(hz_topN ?? 10) || 10)
  const topAdmins = Array.from(rankMap.entries())
    .sort((a,b) => b[1] - a[1])
    .slice(0, n)
    .map(([a]) => a)

  const idx = new Map(topAdmins.map((a, i) => [a, i]))
  const hidx = new Map(hazLevels.map((h, i) => [h, i]))

  const out = set
    .filter((r) => topAdmins.includes(String(r?.admin ?? "")) && hazLevels.includes(String(r?.hazard ?? "")))
    .map((r) => {
      const left = valL(r)
      const right = valR(r)
      return {
        admin: String(r?.admin ?? ""),
        hazard: String(r?.hazard ?? ""),
        total1: Number(r?.total1 ?? 0),
        total2: Number(r?.total2 ?? 0),
        value1: left,
        value2: right,
        delta: right - left
      }
    })
    .sort((a,b) => (idx.get(a.admin) - idx.get(b.admin)) || (hidx.get(a.hazard) - hidx.get(b.hazard)))

  return out
}

hz_q4Chart = {
  const rows = hz_q4RowsChart ?? []
  if (!rows.length) return html`<div class="hz-muted">No data.</div>`

  const subtitle = `${hz_geoLabel} • ${hz_commodityLabel} • Left: ${hz_s1.label} • Right: ${hz_s2.label}`
  const admins = Array.from(new Set(rows.map((d) => d.admin)))
  const hazLevels = hz_q4HazLevels ?? []
  const height = Math.max(280, admins.length * 24, Number(hz_q4_chartHeight ?? 520))
  const xLabel = hz_rel ? "Percent of selected total (%)" : (hz_varLabelAbs ?? "Exposure")
  const xLabelDiff = hz_rel ? "Δ percentage points (Right − Left)" : "Δ exposure (Right − Left)"
  const fmt = (x) => hz_rel ? `${hz_formatNumber(x, { digits: 2 })}%` : hz_formatNumber(x, { digits: 2 })
  const fmtDiff = (x) => hz_rel ? `${hz_formatNumber(x, { digits: 2 })} pp` : hz_formatNumber(x, { digits: 2 })

  const sharedColor = { type: "categorical", domain: hazLevels, scheme: "tableau10", legend: true }
  const legend = Plot.legend({ color: sharedColor, columns: Math.min(4, Math.max(1, hazLevels.length || 1)) })

  const markSide = (data, key, title) => html`
    <div class="hz-mini hz-mini--stack">
      <div class="hz-mini__title">${title}</div>
      ${Plot.plot({
        height,
        marginLeft: 180,
        marginRight: 18,
        marginTop: 10,
        marginBottom: 32,
        x: {
          grid: true,
          label: xLabel,
          tickFormat: (x) => hz_rel ? `${hz_formatNumber(x, { digits: 2 })}` : hz_formatNumber(x, { digits: 0 })
        },
        y: { domain: admins, label: null },
        color: { ...sharedColor, legend: false },
        marks: [
          Plot.ruleX([0]),
          Plot.barX(data, Plot.stackX({
            x: key,
            y: "admin",
            fill: "hazard",
            tip: {
              format: {
                admin: true,
                hazard: true,
                [key]: (x) => fmt(x)
              }
            }
          }))
        ]
      })}
    </div>
  `

  if (hz_q4_difference) {
    const diffRows = rows.map((r) => ({ admin: r.admin, hazard: r.hazard, delta: r.delta }))
    return html`
      ${Plot.plot({
        height,
        marginLeft: 180,
        marginRight: 18,
        marginTop: 10,
        marginBottom: 32,
        x: {
          grid: true,
          label: xLabelDiff,
          tickFormat: (x) => hz_rel ? `${hz_formatNumber(x, { digits: 2 })}` : hz_formatNumber(x, { digits: 0 })
        },
        y: { domain: admins, label: null },
        color: sharedColor,
        marks: [
          Plot.ruleX([0]),
          Plot.barX(diffRows, Plot.stackX({
            x: "delta",
            y: "admin",
            fill: "hazard",
            tip: {
              format: {
                admin: true,
                hazard: true,
                delta: (x) => fmtDiff(x)
              }
            }
          }))
        ]
      })}
      <div class="hz-upsetCaption">${subtitle}</div>
      ${(!hz_q4HazMeta?.ok && !(hz_q4HazDataL?.length || hz_q4HazDataR?.length))
        ? html`<div class="hz-upsetCaption">Hazard-by-admin API not available yet; showing fallback "any" totals only.</div>`
        : html``}
    `
  }

  return html`
    <div class="hz-chartLegend">${legend}</div>
    <div class="hz-grid2 hz-grid2--equal">
      ${markSide(rows, "value1", hz_s1.label)}
      ${markSide(rows, "value2", hz_s2.label)}
    </div>
    <div class="hz-upsetCaption">${subtitle}</div>
    ${(!hz_q4HazMeta?.ok && !(hz_q4HazDataL?.length || hz_q4HazDataR?.length))
      ? html`<div class="hz-upsetCaption">Hazard-by-admin API not available yet; showing fallback "any" totals only.</div>`
      : html``}
  `
}

// View mode toggle (Chart / Dashboard / Summary / Map / Raw records)

viewof hz_viewMode = {
  // Q1 only: Chart + Summary table
  const form = Inputs.radio(
    ["chart", "table"],
    {
      label: "",
      value: "chart",
      format: (v) => ({ chart: "Chart", table: "Summary table" }[v] ?? v),
    }
  )

  form.classList.add("hz-viewToggle")

  const getScroller = () =>
    document.scrollingElement ||
    document.querySelector("#quarto-content") ||
    document.documentElement ||
    document.body

  const preserveAnchor = () => {
    const sc = getScroller()
    const y0 = sc.scrollTop
    const anchor = document.getElementById("q1")
    const a0 = anchor ? anchor.getBoundingClientRect().top : 0

    const restore = () => {
      const sc2 = getScroller()
      const anchor2 = document.getElementById("q1")
      const a1 = anchor2 ? anchor2.getBoundingClientRect().top : 0
      sc2.scrollTop = y0 + (a1 - a0)
    }

    // Restore after reactive reflow
    setTimeout(() => {
      restore()
      requestAnimationFrame(restore)
      requestAnimationFrame(restore)
    }, 0)
  }

  form.addEventListener(
    "change",
    () => {
      try {
        document.activeElement?.blur?.()
      } catch (_) {}
      preserveAnchor()
    },
    true
  )

  return form
}

viewof hz_recordsSide = {
  const options = [
    { value: "left",  label: "Left" },
    { value: "right", label: "Right" }
  ];

  const root = document.createElement("div");
  root.className = "hz-tabs hz-tabs--small";

  const buttons = new Map();
  const paint = (v) => {
    for (const [val, btn] of buttons.entries()) btn.classList.toggle("is-active", val === v);
  };

  const set = (v, { silent = false } = {}) => {
    if (root.value === v) return;
    root.value = v;
    paint(v);
    if (!silent) root.dispatchEvent(new Event("input", { bubbles: true }));
  };

  for (const op of options) {
    const btn = document.createElement("button");
    btn.type = "button";
    btn.className = "hz-tab";
    btn.textContent = op.label;
    btn.onclick = () => set(op.value);
    buttons.set(op.value, btn);
    root.appendChild(btn);
  }

  set("left", { silent: true });
  return root;
}

viewof hz_recordsSort = {

viewof hz_recordsPageSize = {
  const options = [50, 100, 200, 500]
  const sel = Inputs.select(options, {

viewof hz_recordsPage = {
  const root = document.createElement("div");
  root.className = "hz-pager";
  root.value = 1;

  const prev = document.createElement("button");
  prev.type = "button";
  prev.className = "hz-btn hz-btn--sm";
  prev.textContent = "Prev";

  const label = document.createElement("div");
  label.className = "hz-pager__label";

  const next = document.createElement("button");
  next.type = "button";
  next.className = "hz-btn hz-btn--sm";
  next.textContent = "Next";

  const paint = () => { label.textContent = `Page ${root.value}`; };

  const set = (v, { silent = false } = {}) => {
    const n = Math.max(1, Number(v || 1));
    if (root.value === n) return;
    root.value = n;
    paint();
    if (!silent) root.dispatchEvent(new Event("input", { bubbles: true }));
  };

  prev.onclick = () => set(root.value - 1);
  next.onclick = () => set(root.value + 1);

  root.appendChild(prev);
  root.appendChild(label);
  root.appendChild(next);

  paint();
  return root;
}

hz_safeEnhancedMultiSelect = (options, cfg = {}) => {
  const label = cfg.label ?? "Select"
  const placeholder = cfg.placeholder ?? "Search…"
  const disabled = !!cfg.disabled

  // Normalize selected values to plain strings
  const value = (Array.isArray(cfg.value) ? cfg.value : [])
    .map(v => (v && typeof v === "object") ? (v.value ?? v.name ?? v.label ?? v.id ?? v) : v)
    .map(v => String(v ?? "").trim())
    .filter(Boolean)

  // Normalize options into {value,label} with *string* values.
  const rows = (options ?? [])
    .map((o) => {
      if (o == null) return null
      if (typeof o === "string" || typeof o === "number") {
        const v = String(o).trim()
        if (!v) return null
        const lbl = (typeof cfg.format === "function") ? String(cfg.format(v)) : v
        return { value: v, label: lbl }
      }
      if (typeof o === "object") {
        const v = String(o.value ?? o.id ?? o.key ?? o.name ?? "").trim()
        if (!v) return null
        const lbl = String(o.label ?? o.name ?? o.value ?? v)
        return { value: v, label: lbl }
      }
      return null
    })
    .filter(Boolean)

  const map = new Map(rows.map(r => [r.value, r.label]))
  const values = Array.from(new Set(rows.map(r => r.value)))

  const format = (v) => map.get(String(v)) ?? String(v)

  const viewofSelect = Inputs.select(values, {
    label,
    multiple: true,
    value,
    disabled,
    format
  })

  return enhancedMultiSelect(viewofSelect, {
    placeholder,
    requireAtLeastOne: false,
    maxHeight: cfg.maxHeight ?? 200,
    width: cfg.width ?? "100%"
  })
}

hz_normSel2 = (x) => {
  const arr = x == null ? [] : (Array.isArray(x) ? x : [x])
  const toStr = (d) => {
    if (d == null) return ""
    if (typeof d === "string" || typeof d === "number") return String(d)
    if (typeof d === "object") {
      if ("admin2_name" in d) return d.admin2_name == null ? "" : String(d.admin2_name)
      if ("admin1_name" in d) return d.admin1_name == null ? "" : String(d.admin1_name)
      if ("admin0_name" in d) return d.admin0_name == null ? "" : String(d.admin0_name)
      return String(d.value ?? d.name ?? d.label ?? d.id ?? "")
    }
    return String(d)
  }
  return arr.map(toStr).map((s) => String(s).trim()).filter((s) => s.length > 0)
}
hz_q2_geoFilter = ({ admin0: hz_normSel2(hz_q2_admin0), admin1: hz_normSel2(hz_q2_admin1), admin2: hz_normSel2(hz_q2_admin2) })

hz_makeGeoLabel = (gf) => {
  const a0 = Array.isArray(gf?.admin0) ? gf.admin0.filter(Boolean) : []
  const a1 = Array.isArray(gf?.admin1) ? gf.admin1.filter(Boolean) : []
  const a2 = Array.isArray(gf?.admin2) ? gf.admin2.filter(Boolean) : []
  const hasAll = a0.length === 0 || a0.includes("all")
  const fmt = (arr, max = 2) => {
    const xs = arr.slice(0, max)
    const more = arr.length > max ? ` +${arr.length - max}` : ""
    return xs.join(", ") + more
  }
  if (hasAll) return "All"
  if (a2.length) return `ADM2: ${fmt(a2)}`
  if (a1.length) return `ADM1: ${fmt(a1)}`
  return `ADM0: ${fmt(a0)}`
}

hz_makeComLabel = (arr) => {
  const xs = (arr ?? []).map(v => (v?.value ?? v)).filter(Boolean)
  if (!xs.length) return "All"
  const head = xs.slice(0, 2).map(hz_commodityLabelOf).join(", ")
  const more = xs.length > 2 ? ` +${xs.length - 2}` : ""
  return head + more
}

hz_q3ReqBody = (() => {
  // Reuse the same guard logic as Q2 (shared dataset + geo payload)
  if (!hz_q2ReqOk.ok) return { ok: false, error: hz_q2ReqOk.error, body: null }

  const left = {
    dataset_url: hz_src1?.url,
    scen: { scenario: hz_s1?.scenario, timeframe: hz_s1?.timeframe },
    geo: hz_geoFilterApi,
